verses.verse: Now in the twelfth<WH8147><WH6240> month<WH2320>, that is, the month<WH2320> Adar<WH143>, on the thirteenth<WH7969><WH6240> day<WH3117> of the same, when the king's<WH4428> commandment<WH1697> and his decree<WH1881> drew near<WH5060> to be put in execution<WH6213>, in the day<WH3117> that the enemies<WH341> of the Jews<WH3064> hoped<WH7663> to have power<WH7980> over them, (though it was turned<WH2015> to the contrary, that the Jews<WH3064> had rule<WH7980> over them that hated<WH8130> them;)

¶ And Mordecai<WH4782> wrote<WH3789> these things<WH1697>, and sent<WH7971> letters<WH5612> unto all the Jews<WH3064> that were in all the provinces<WH4082> of the king<WH4428> Ahasuerus<WH325>, both nigh<WH7138> and far<WH7350>,
